channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Abolish the FCC
item.description: Rather than fantasizing about using government power to punish the left, Republicans should foreclose the possibility of future suppression.

item.title: New Texas law triggers legal battle over affordable housing agreement
item.description: A legal battle is heating up over a new Texas state law that advocates say is closing the curtain on tax exemptions that developers have abused under ...

item.title: Trump and Xi begin talks in a push to finalize a TikTok deal
item.description: U.S. President Trump is talking with Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Friday in a push to finalize a deal to allow the popular social media app TikTok to ...

item.title: Kimmel’s Suspension Gives Local Stations The Chance To Beat Back Hollywood’s Content Monopoly
item.description: ABC suspended Jimmy Kimmel’s late night show not because the network found his lies about Charlie Kirk’s assassin abhorrent, but rather because local ...

item.title: Conservatives hoot as leftists launch Disney boycott for yanking Jimmy Kimmel
item.description: After years of aggravating the right with its woke content and policies, Disney has now officially enraged the left.

item.title: Poll worker who faked MAGA bomb plot sent to prison
item.description: A man who faked a bomb threat while pretending to be an angry conservative voter during last year's presidential election was sentenced to 20 months i...

item.title: Following Kirk's assassination, Republicans sour on direction of the country, new AP-NORC poll finds
item.description: Republicans' outlook on the direction of the country has soured dramatically, according to a new AP-NORC poll that was conducted shortly after last we...

item.title: The Only Way To End Leftist Violence Is To Defeat Leftism Itself
item.description: If Americans want to live in a country where young men aren't assassinated for articulating truth, the political ideology that led to Charlie Kirk's m...

item.title: Patients Win with Free Speech for Pharmaceutical Ads
item.description: Patients should be free to choose what products they want, but also be free to learn about them.

item.title: The Week: Democrats Flirt with Shutdown Politics
item.description: Plus: ABC suspends Jimmy Kimmel indefinitely.

item.title: Late-Night Hack Jimmy Kimmel Has Only Himself To Blame For His Suspension
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel is not a free speech victim. He's a leftist joke who said something really stupid and is now paying a professional price.

item.title: Riefenstahl Raises the Riddle of Artistic Heroism
item.description: A timely hit job equates cinema and politics.

item.title: Why The Feds Can’t Trust Utah To Achieve The Death Penalty For Charlie Kirk’s Murderer
item.description: As President Trump vows a full federal investigation, Attorney General Pam Bondi needs to file federal charges that carry the death penalty.

item.title: We Are Not Going To Have A Debate About Free Speech
item.description: The cancellation of Jimmy Kimmel’s show doesn’t matter. What matters is the left’s embrace of political violence.

item.title: The Kirk Assassination Won’t Silence Us
item.description: We need to find the courage to speak as free men.
